Hero.description: An enterprise-grade, encrypted backup solution designed to capture your Microsoft Teams chats, files, and channels. Maintain full ownership of your organization's entire memory.

Features.title: Why backup Microsoft Teams?
Features.subtitle: Essential features engineered for enterprise compliance and peace of mind.
Features.f1Desc: Set it and forget it. Our engine runs daily differential backups of your entire organization.
Features.f2Desc: All data is securely encrypted at rest (AES-256) on your local/cloud volumes.
Features.f3Desc: We pull full message history, channel files, and threaded replies faithfully.
Features.f4Desc: Extract and restore formats native to auditors and legal discovery teams.

Comparison.title: Why default tools aren't enough
Comparison.subtitle: Microsoft Teams is built for communication, not for permanent, searchable record keeping.
